ARABIC: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِنْ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the truth came to them from Us, they said, 'This is downright magic!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus, when the truth had come to them from Us, they said: "Surely this is nothing but pure magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when truth came to them from Us, they said: 'Indeed this is plain sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the Truth from Us came, they called it simply magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the truth came to them from Us, they said, “Indeed this is a clear magic.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So when came to them the truth from Us, they said: "This is indeed clear magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when the truth came to them from Us they said: This is most surely clear enchantment!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, when the truth came to them from Us, they said, 'Surely this is a manifest sorcery.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the Truth from Our presence came unto them, they said: Lo! this is mere magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the truth came to them from Us, they said, "This is plain sorcery."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when there came unto them the truth from Us, they said: verily this is magic manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the truth from Us came to them, they said, ‘This is indeed plain magic!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the Truth did come to them from Us, they said: "This is indeed evident sorcery!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So when came to them the truth from Us, they said: "This is indeed clear magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When the truth came to them from Us they said: 'This is indeed clear magic'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when the truth came to them from Us, they said, “This is clearly sorcery.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when there came to them the truth from Us, they said, "Indeed, this is obvious magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:76] So, when the Truth came to them from Us, they said, ‘Surely this is manifest sorcery’, [sorcery that is] clear and evident.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the Truth) the Scripture, the Messenger and the revelations (from Our presence came unto them, they said: This) what Moses has brought (is mere magic) is a manifest lie; and according to a different reading this means: Moses is a lying sorcerer.
